location_context.description: Place or spatial context of the experience.

associated_people.description: Individuals referenced in or connected to the experience.
associated_people.x_constraints: Names or roles, properly cased (e.g., "Sarah", "my father", "the nurse").

visibility_context.description: Defines the intended visibility or sharing scope of the moment.

tone_shift.description: Directional emotional change during the experience.
tone_shift.x_constraints: Free text (e.g., "loss to gratitude", "fear to relief", "joy to sadness").
